statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT manufacturer, product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, manufactured_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufactured_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Pfizer%' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufactured_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND manufacturer = 'Johnson & Johnson' ORDER BY manufacturer, product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM price_list WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_list ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, address FROM manufacturer_list ORDER BY manufacturer_name
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_list WHERE product_name LIKE '%hat%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_list WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM price_list WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM price_list WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer_list WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL ORDER BY manufacturer_id ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, address FROM manufacturer_list WHERE manufacturer_name = 'Samsung' ORDER BY manufacturer_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM price_list JOIN manufacturer_list ON price_list.product_id = manufacturer_list.manufacturer_id WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pharmaceutical_products GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products LEFT JOIN product_prices ON pharmaceutical_products.product_id = product_prices.product_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products INNER JOIN product_categories ON pharmaceutical_products.category_id = product_categories.category_id
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM Product p JOIN Manufacturer m ON p.product_id = m.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM Product p JOIN ProductCategory pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN Category c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer INNER JOIN Product ON Manufacturer.manufacturer_id = Product.product_id WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Manufacturing';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM Product INNER JOIN Manufacturer ON Product.product_id = Manufacturer.manufacturer_id ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM Product INNER JOIN ProductCategory ON Product.product_id = ProductCategory.product_id INNER JOIN Category ON ProductCategory.category_id = Category.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Product WHERE price < 100 GROUP BY category_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM product_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, review_text FROM pharmaceutical_products p JOIN product_reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
SELECT pp.product_name, pc.category_name FROM pharmaceutical_products pp JOIN product_mapping pm ON pp.product_id = pm.product_id JOIN product_categories pc ON pm.category_id = pc.category_id;
SELECT pr.review_text, pp.product_name FROM product_reviews pr JOIN pharmaceutical_products pp ON pr.product_id = pp.product_id WHERE pr.review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pp.product_name ASC;
